page.title: 05Caravan Park,Aston Cantlow
page.content: The caravan site is called Island Meadow.The caravan site has fifty big static holiday caravans owened privately.Five big statics owned by the camp site for hiring.Twenty touring caravans and six places for tents.Nobody can live permanently on the caravan site.People only go there for holidays.They have a shop on the site with sweets etc.the facilities they have are flush toilets,showers,electricity,caravans and fishing. In some of the big statics you can fit about eight people and in the touring caravans anything between two and six.There are a lot of ducks on the site as well.The approx.price for an average family is about eighty pounds a week and for their own touring caravan is about twenty pounds.
